Story.title: FoG
Story.Description: We make story for Prom Week

Level.title: Arm Candy
Level.Description: Every king needs a queen. Zack is going to have to score a girlfriend that is totally cool before he stands a chance at becoming prom royalty.

Level.title: Game Over!
Level.Description: Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.

Story.title: Project Popularstein
Story.Description: After Naomi's previous FAILED makeover, she is willing to try again.

Level.title: Operation: Trust Gain
Level.Description: To begin this popularity makeover, Naomi must become friends with the unfashionable Doug.

Level.title: Operation: Rise to Power
Level.Description: Under Naomi's wing, Doug must go out and make two new friends in order to become the new popular kid in school.

Level.title: Operation: Drop the Baggage
Level.Description: Naomi's tutelage was going successfully, but a major error has occurred. Being friends with Simon is equivalent to social suicide. Something must be done. Doug must leave this baggage behind on his own, or socially die trying.

Level.title: Game Over!
Level.Description: Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.

Story.title: Breaking Up the Popular Crowd
Story.Description: Edward is so sick of the popular crowd at school. Help Edward demolish the social royalty.

Level.title: Spreading Rumors
Level.Description: To start causing social rumbling before the dramaquake, Edward has start the rumor mill. Edward must gossip with two other people to start this dramabomb. (Currently, someone must think Edward is more then 65 cool)

Level.title: The Cheating Game
Level.Description: Now it is time to strike a fatal blow. Edward must get one of the popular people to cheat on their significant others.

Level.title: The enemy of my enemies
Level.Description: Finally, the time has come to cause panic and crush the popular kids. Make any two popular student enemies with another popular person.

Level.title: Game Over!
Level.Description: Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.

Story.title: Becoming the Most Popular of the Popular
Story.Description: Nicholas is tired of always competing to stay popular. Now is the time to destroy the competition and rise up as the king of the popular crowd.

Level.title: Dethroning the King
Level.Description: Nicholas must first ruin the reputation of the most popular kid at school, Oswald. Nicholas must stop Oswald's reign by making him unpopular, or it would be equally demeaning if Oswald became friends with an unpopular student.

Level.title: Finding a Popular Queen
Level.Description: In order to cement his role in the popular hierarchy, Nicholas must date a popular girl.

Level.title: Getting the Vote of the Peasants
Level.Description: In order to become the best, Nicholas must do something *so* crazy that no one before has thought of it. Nicholas must become friends with at least two unpopular people, so he will be liked by all in his kingdom.

Level.title: Game Over!
Level.Description: Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.

Story.title: Getting Ready For Prom
Story.Description: There is only a week before Prom and Monica has sooooooooo much work to do.

Level.title: Ego Rising
Level.Description: Monica can't go to a Prom where she isn't the center of attention. Make sure Monica brags to at least 3 people or is idolized by 3 people.(Currently she must become friends with one other person)

Level.title: Stopping the Popular Competition
Level.Description: Naomi is ruining Monica's Prom fame. Make sure to gossip with 3 people in order to ruin any plans she has for the Prom. (Currently, make enemies with Naomi)

Level.title: Getting a Date
Level.Description: Oh No! Monica lost her current boyfriend right before the Prom. Monica will have to find a new boyfriend or else it will be the end of the World.

Level.title: Game Over!
Level.Description: Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.

Story.title: Getting the Guy of her Dreams
Story.Description: Get Lil the guy of her dreams.

Level.title: The Break Up
Level.Description: Make sure Nicholas and Monica are broken up so he is ripe for the taking.

Level.title: Making Friends
Level.Description: In order to have better chances with Nicholas, Lil has to do one of two things. Either make friends with one of Nicholas's friends, or break up with her current boyfriend Zack.

Level.title: Getting the Guy
Level.Description: All of Lil's work comes down to this. Time to get Lil a brand new boyfriend. Get Lil and Nicholas to date.

Story.title: PromKing
Story.Description: Zack's a l33t dude, but even his friends say he's obnoxious. (His enemies say things we won't repeat here.) Can your deft social maneuvering crown this ubergeek the Prom King?

Level.title: Who You Know
Level.Description: Getting crowned Prom King isn't just a popularity contest - it's also about playing the judges. Naomi's head of the Prom Committee, so if Zack wants that crown, he'd better make sure she understands how freaking cool he is.

Level.title: Arm Candy
Level.Description: Every king needs a queen. Zack is going to have to score a girlfriend that is totally cool before he stands a chance at becoming prom royalty.

Level.title: The Big Night
Level.Description: OMG, it's the night of the Prom! Everyone looks swank and the air is thick with anticipation (or maybe just cheap cologne). Zack has one last chance to become the Prom King... but how many hearts must break along the way?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh %i%, you did it! You're the Prom %gender(i,King, Queen)%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But of course, %r%. Did you ever doubt me? I never doubted me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, there was that one time when %toc1%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Silence! My first act as king is to strip that from the yearbook record!
For my second act... I think somebody is getting an upgrade.
You know it, gigababe. You're now.... my tera-babe.
Come, my %gender(r,king,queen)%, let's wave to the little people...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: They look so small from over here...
Oh, %i%, who would have thought the first time we met that one day we'd be crowned prom royalty!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... I couldn't say for both of us, but....
I'm the Prom %gender(i,King, Queen)%! This is everything I ever wanted.
Except.... I always thought I'd have a Prom %if(0,princess)elseif(1,prince)elseif(3,king)else(queen)%...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You will. There must be someone out there for you...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe that someone is closer than either of us realize.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%. There are a million reasons to say no, and only one reason to say yes!

Rule.name: i is female, r is female
i is male, r is male
i is female, r is male

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'd like to thank everyone who helped make this moment possible, the Prom Selection Committee, my friends, %random(whoever invented proms back in the 1960s or whatever,the president of the United States,German expressionism,tofu products in general)%, %random(astronaut ice cream,Superman ice cream,the internet,the Academy)%, %random(the Police Academy,my barber,the circus,the dairy section at our local supermarket)%, %random(our high school,our team mascot,modern medicine,the letter Q)%...
And, uh, my parents and, of course, Mr. Al Garcia! Thank you, good night!
